DOC.brief_summary: The objective study 1. explore incidence cumulative prevalence pelvic girdle pain ( PGP ) subgroups prospective longitudinal study pregnancy , 18 week 6 week delivery . 2. examine outcome chiropractic management dominate one-sided PGP subgroup pregnant woman single-blinded controlled study , use efficacy measure include pain , functional impairment , sick-leave frequency . 3. investigate possible predictor treatment outcome one-sided PGP pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Girdle Pain Pregnant Population Western Norway .
DOC.criteria: Lumbopelvic pain Pelvic pain Performed ultrasound examination 18th pregnancy week Expected normal pregnancy without complication Good competency Norwegian language
